text:
@TomFitton Not Much-
If you read when Doctors and Nurses are required to wear..
It's different.
According the New England Journal of Medicine and W.H.O requirements May 25th-
They said masks only needed if caring for #Covid19 .
6 foot Separation is effective ..  not Masks.
NEJM ⬇️ https://t.co/6Z8Oi8TcZJ

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
